markdownRemark.html:
Hi all! Thank you for reading these lines.

My name is Mason. My Vietnamese name is Cường. I'm a front-end developer with 3 years of experience (Counting from the present time when I write this post).

I'm coding ReactJS and NodeJS, almost a time is ReactJS. The goal in the future is a full-stack js developer.

I admit I'm not a good or excellent developer. However, I still want to share my experience, my problem, and how to resolve them with everyone.

I hope will be received the contribution from you.

Glad to see you!
